chapters.title: Chapter 13: Punishment
chapters.info: Liandrin, p. 164 (127)—Aes Sedai of the Black Ajah. Before she and twelve others left the White Tower, she masqueraded as a member of the Red Ajah. She attempted to “give” Nynaeve and Elayne to the Seanchan, and actually did give Egwene to them. She has a face like a doll.
